alert.note: Alert for Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:16PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Greenup, north central Carter and west central Lawrence Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1115 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Load, or 11 miles northeast of Carter Caves State Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ironton, Greenup, Load, Greenbo Lake, Letitia, Franklin Furnace, Flatwoods, Russell, Raceland, Worthington, Wurtland, Hanging Rock, Brushart, Haverhill, Warnock, Grays Branch and Pedro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
